Comments_List: Learned SO MUCH about quantum mechanics and the philosophical problems and puzzles that surround the field.

I think the teacher could stand to be more ruthless at the beginning of the course, when it came to moving through the QM formalisms and laying out the main views. Some students might have been more confused, but it would have been really nice to have more of the semester dedicated to the philosophy.
Yes--this course was challenging and very rewarding
